solution_line_template: First find the total number of liters a mosquito sucks in one feeding: {drops_per_feeding} drops / {drops_per_liter} drops/liter = <<{drops_per_feeding}/{drops_per_liter}={liters_per_feeding}>>{liters_per_feeding} L/feeding

Then divide the lethal amount of blood by the amount of blood one mosquito can drain: {lethal_blood_liters} L / {liters_per_feeding} L/feeding = <<{lethal_blood_liters}/{liters_per_feeding}={num_mosquitoes}>>{num_mosquitoes} feedings
